bug.description: setup.py line: 20 long_description = open(os.path.join(here, 'README.md')).read() --> long_description = open(os.path.join(here, 'README.md'), 'r', encoding='utf-8').read() else will get error: UnicodeDecodeError: 'gbk' codec can't decode byte 0x93 in position 3100: illegal multibyte sequence
